characteristics.characteristic: 2014-02-16 Comments: COSMOS 1220 was a Soviet naval reconnaisance satellite launched from the Baikonur cosmodrome aboard a Tsyklon 2 rocket. This naval forces monitoring spacecraft was used to determine the position of enemy naval forces through detection and triangulation of their electrmagnetic emissions (radio, radar, etc).

link.title: This article uses material from AFSPC
